ctu_text: > **Features of the POMIS scheme:** 1. Maturity period- The maximum tenure of the Indian post office monthly income scheme is 5 years. 1. Number of holders- At least 1 and at most 3 individuals can hold post office MIS.

ctu_text: Transfer- Individuals can transfer their MIS account in one post office to another anywhere in India. \n1. POMIS bonus- Accounts opened after 1st Dec 2011 have no bonus facility. However, those opened before that enjoy a 5% bonus.
